Posts.Content: I was diagnosed October 17, 1997 and had tumor removed 4 days later.  My nodes were negative, margins clear and  33 radiation treatments later.  Have followed up religiously and never had any more problems.  Good luck to you! On 12/29/2007 ruthlillian wrote: Had surgery last month to remove ACC from breast. My nodes were negative and my margins were clear. Radiation is being considered but not a certainty.No other treatment is being considered or recommended. I would like to know what others have experienced in similar situations.Many thanks.
Posts.Title: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma in the Breast
